concept.title: Example plugin: Build Katalon Studio TestRail Integration plugin

conbody.p: This document shows you the way to implement Katalon Studio TestRail integration plugin. All functions are implemented using extension point, which are declared in plugin.xml. You can see pluginâ€™s activities by selecting the tab Event Log (next to Console):
The source code is made available here on our GitHub repository for reference:
This document is not about how to use the plugin. Visit TestRail integration document if you need help.
